eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Kentucky; AT 12:50 AM ON SEP 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:50 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a coordinated monthly test of the Kentucky Emergency Alert System. In cooperation with Federal, State, and local officials, broadcasters are testing equipment to ensure that you may be quickly warned, in the event of an emergency. This has been a Required Monthly Test of the E A S Network. No action is needed. This is only a test.
